dcterms:creator: T. Alldieck
M. A. Magnor
W. Xu
C. Theobalt
G. Pons-Moll
dcterms:description: PeopleSnapshot comprises various monocular RGB videos of different subjects recorded in natural settings. In these videos, individuals assume an A-pose and rotate in place facing a stationary camera.
dcterms:title: PeopleSnapshot

dcterms:creator: P. Zablotskaia
A. Siarohin
B. Zhao
L. Sigal
dcterms:description: UBC-Fashion contains videos of subjects turning around in front of a stationary camera in loose clothing, used to evaluate methods on in-the-wild long clothing variations.
dcterms:title: UBC-Fashion

dcterms:creator: B. L. Bhatnagar
G. Tiwari
C. Theobalt
G. Pons-Moll
dcterms:description: The Multi-Garment dataset features 3D scanned models of the human body complete with textures, along with corresponding SMPL-D models that are registered for use in animation.
dcterms:title: Multi-Garment dataset
